info.name: G+ Google plus - wide design (may 2012)
info.description:
UPDATED after css-refactoring of g+ in may 2012!

Wide content area. Suitable for all screen resolution - maximum width of content column is limited to 960px. (content won't be too wide either)
info.additionalInfo:
Content column in center and with maximum width of 960px. (works on search page, too!)
Black colour of comments text!
